name: Get Tanked
description:
You and your opponent are strapped inside of a tank and one of your options are either defeat the other player's tank or it's the other way around and lose in humility of defeat. Watch out for mines as those can benefit to either side and boost anyone's points. 

Player 1 Controls: A and D to rotate. W to move forward. S to move backwards. Weapons: F to fire main cannon. Q to launch anti mine beam

Player 2 Controls: 4 and 6 to rotate. 8 to move forward. 5 to move backwards. 7 to fire main cannon. Delete key is to launch fragment bomb.

NOTE: Secondary weapons only work on mines
